title: Stephen's Audience Q&A: Why Don't You Grow a Mustache? | Colbert Classic
description:
Every night before the show, our host Stephen Colbert takes questions from the audience. This time he's asked to explain why his "Colbeard" look never evolved into a proper mustache.
